name: svg-flags
description: SVG and PNG renders of all countries' flags.

scripts.build-100-250-1000-pngs: node build-pngs.js 100: && node build-pngs.js 250: && node build-pngs.js 1000:
scripts.build: node build-pngs.js 64: && node build-pngs.js 128: && node build-pngs.js 256: && node build-pngs.js 512:
scripts.build-tmp: node build-pngs.js 128: && node build-pngs.js 256: && node build-pngs.js 512:

author: Hampus Nilsson
